name: "Krasscoins" | Krassjam 2
description:
ONLY WINDOWS FOR THE MOMENT SORRY

IF THE WEB GAME DON'T WORK PLEASE DOWNLOAD IT!

Please have volume turned on for maximal experience!

Get alot of money and buy everything from the shop.

You may need to adjust the volume in the middle of the game, sorry...

If you get stuck with not enough money or coins, click the reset button to reset the game. Basically a gameover but i didnt add it for some reason..
